import React from "react"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { data } from "../data"; import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductScreen = () => { const params = useParams(); const product = data.products.find((product) => product.id === +params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status:
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
); }; export default ProductScreen;
